gobblin.runtime.job_catalog

Class CachingJobCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.CachingJobCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, Instrumentable, JobCatalog, JobCatalogListenersContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableCachingJobCatalog

    public class CachingJobCatalog
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements JobCatalog
    A JobCatalog decorator that caches all JobSpecs in memory.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobCatalog

      • addListener

        public void addListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Adds a JobCatalogListener that will be invoked upon updates on the JobCatalog. Upon registration JobCatalogListener.onAddJob(JobSpec) will be invoked for all pre-existing jobs in the JobCatalog.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Removes the specified listener. No-op if not registered.
        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer

      • registerWeakJobCatalogListener

        public void registerWeakJobCatalogListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Description copied from interface: JobCatalogListenersContainer
        Like JobCatalogListenersContainer.addListener(JobCatalogListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed using JobCatalogListenersContainer.removeListener(JobCatalogListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakJobCatalogListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer
